content: Dear @James Agnew the issue 1066 is easy to solve (simply add a closing bracket to the xst) and is ESSENTIAL for anyone working on R4 . Can you please add @luto65 and @maviccprp to the contributors so that we can provide the fix asap? :simple_smile: thanks

Please see the ticket for details on what the next steps are:

https://github.com/jamesagnew/hapi-fhir/issues/1066
